table: IBM Extended Character Codes, BIOS Keyboard Interface
description: Extended character codes returned by the IBM BIOS in the keyboard buffer, through INT 16h, and at the MS-DOS console driver as 00h <code>
notes: Some codes match the scan code returned by the keyboard. See also "IBM keyboard scan code set 1"

table columns.name: code
table columns.title: Scan code
table columns.description: Character code returned by BIOS INT 16h

table columns.name: keystroke
table columns.title: Key combination
table columns.description: Key combination that generates the character code

table columns.title: Extended
table columns.name: extended
table columns.description: Whether INT 16h AH=10h is needed to read this code
